_metadata.description: SEB Config Tool menu locations for boolean options - macOS Version
_metadata.format: Tab → Section → Option (English labels as in original tool)
_metadata.note: Menu labels remain in English (as in SEB Config Tool). Only hint texts are translated.
_metadata.contributors: Extracted from screenshots of macOS SEB Config Tool

de.notDocumentedHint: Diese Option ist noch nicht in der Dokumentation erfasst

en.notDocumentedHint: This option is not yet documented

allowUserToQuitSEB.macos: General → Allow user to quit SEB

allowPreferencesWindow.macos: Configuration → Allow to open Preferences window on client

allowQRCodeConfig.macos: Configuration → iOS Settings → Allow QR code config

showSettingsInApp.macos: Configuration → iOS Settings → Show settings in app

showEditConfigFileQuickAction.macos: Configuration → iOS Settings → Show 'Edit Config File' Quick Action

enableBrowserWindowToolbar.macos: User Interface → Toolbar/Menu Bar/Status Bar → Enable browser window toolbar

hideToolbarAsDefault.macos: User Interface → Toolbar/Menu Bar/Status Bar → Hide toolbar as default

showMenuBar.macos: User Interface → Toolbar/Menu Bar/Status Bar → Show menu bar

showTaskBar.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show SEB dock

enableScrollLock.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Enable scroll lock (iOS)

showScrollLockButton.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show scroll lock button (iOS)

showSideMenu.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show side menu (Win)

showBackToStartButton.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show Back to Start button

showNavigationButtons.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show navigation buttons (iOS)

showAddressBarAdditionalWindows.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show address bar for additional windows (Win)

showAddressBarMainWindow.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show address bar for main window (Win)

showReloadButton.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show reload button

showScanQRCodeButton.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show scan QR code button (iOS)

showTime.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show time

showKeyboardLayout.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show keyboard layout (Win)

showQuitButton.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show quit button

showWiFiControl.macos: User Interface → SEB dock/taskbar → Show Wi-Fi control (Win)

enablePageZoom.macos: User Interface → Enable zoom → Enable page zoom

enableTextZoom.macos: User Interface → Enable zoom → Enable text zoom

allowSpellCheck.macos: User Interface → Spell Checker → Allow spell checking (Win)

allowDictionaryLookup.macos: User Interface → Spell Checker → Allow dictionary look up

blockPopUpWindows.macos: Browser → Links requesting to be opened in a new browser window ... → block when directing to a different server

allowTextSearch.macos: Browser → Browser Features → Allow text search

tabFocusesLinks.macos: Browser → Browser Features → Tab focuses links

blockPopupWindows.macos: Browser → Browser Features → Block pop-up windows

reloadPageAfterConnectionError.macos: Browser → Browser Features → Reload page after connection error

enableRightMouseButton.macos: Browser → Browser Features → Enable right mouse button

enableWebInspector.macos: Browser → Browser Features → Enable Web Inspector (developer tools)

enablePDFReaderToolbar.macos: Browser → Browser Features → Enable toolbar of PDF reader (Win)

allowNavigatingBack.macos: Browser → Restrictions in Exam Window → Allow navigation

browserWindowAllowReload.macos: Browser → Restrictions in Exam Window → Allow reload

showReloadWarning.macos: Browser → Restrictions in Exam Window → Show reload warning

allowNavigatingAdditionalWindows.macos: Browser → Restrictions in Additional Windows → Allow navigation

allowReloadAdditionalWindows.macos: Browser → Restrictions in Additional Windows → Allow reload

showReloadWarningAdditionalWindows.macos: Browser → Restrictions in Additional Windows → Show reload warning

allowCameraCapture.macos: Browser → Media Playback/Capture → Allow camera capture

allowMicrophoneCapture.macos: Browser → Media Playback/Capture → Allow microphone capture

allowInlinePlaybackIPad.macos: Browser → Media Playback/Capture → Allow inline playback on iPad

allowInlinePlaybackIPhone.macos: Browser → Media Playback/Capture → Allow inline playback on iPhone

allowPictureInPictureVideo.macos: Browser → Media Playback/Capture → Allow picture in picture video (iOS)

allowScreenCapture.macos: Browser → Media Playback/Capture → Allow screen capture

disableClassicWebViewDeprecationWarning.macos: Browser → Select Browser Engine Policy → Disable classic WebView deprecation warning

allowDownloadUploads.macos: Down/Uploads → Allow downloading and uploading files (deprecated, start using separate settings below!)

allowCustomDownloadUploadLocation.macos: Down/Uploads → Allow user to select custom down/upload directory (Win)

downloadPDFFiles.macos: Down/Uploads → Download and open PDF files instead of displaying them inline

allowPDFPlugIn.macos: Down/Uploads → Allow using Acrobat Reader PDF plugin (insecure)

allowUploadingPhotosAndFiles.macos: Down/Uploads → Allow uploading photos and files (iOS)

downloadAndOpenSebConfig.macos: Down/Uploads → Download and open SEB config files

copyBrowserExamKeyToClipboard.macos: Exam → Browser & Config Keys → Copy Browser Exam Key to clipboard when quitting

copyConfigKeyToClipboard.macos: Exam → Browser & Config Keys → Copy Config Key to clipboard when quitting

sendBrowserConfigKeysInHTTPHeader.macos: Exam → Browser & Config Keys → Send Browser & Config Keys in HTTP Header

quitURLConfirm.macos: Exam → Link to quit SEB after exam → Ask user to confirm quitting

restartExamUseStartURL.macos: Exam → Link to quit SEB after exam → Restart instead of quitting

useStartURL.macos: Exam → Back to Start Button → Use Start URL (see General pane)

protectBackToStartButton.macos: Exam → Back to Start Button → Protect Back to Start Button with the quit/unlock password

allowReconfiguring.macos: Exam → Reconfiguring Secure/Exam Session → Allow reconfiguring secure/exam session

clearSessionOnStart.macos: Exam → Session Cookies → Clear on session start

clearSessionOnEnd.macos: Exam → Session Cookies → Clear on session end

allowQueryParameter.macos: Exam → Query String Parameter → Allow Query Parameter

allowDeepLinkingForExams.macos: Exam → Exam Deep Linking → Allow Deep Linking for Exams

allowAppSwitching.macos: Applications → Allow app switching (open book/debug mode)

filterEmbeddedContent.macos: Network → Filter → Filter also embedded content

teachSEBAllowedBlockedURLs.macos: Network → Filter → Teach SEB allowed/blocked URLs

usePassiveFTPMode.macos: Network → Proxies → Use Passive FTP Mode (PASV)

allowVirtualMachine.macos: Security → Allow to run inside virtual machine

allowScreenCaptureRecording.windowsDifferent: Browser → Media Playback/Capture → Allow screen capture

enforceBlockingScreenSharing.macos: Security → Enforce blocking screen sharing on Mac

enforcePrivateClipboard.macos: Security → Enforce private clipboard on Mac

preferAssessmentMode.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Prefer Assessment Mode (AAC)

disableAppSwitcherOnStart.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Disable app switcher when starting

forceAppFolderInstall.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Force installation in /Applications folder

allowUserApplicationsFolder.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Allow also user's ~/Applications folder

allowSiri.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Allow to use Siri

allowDictation.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Allow to use dictation

detectStoppedProcess.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Detect when SEB process was stopped

allowDisplayMirroring.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Allow display mirroring (affects also AirPlay Display)

useBuiltinDisplay.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Use built-in display

enforceBuiltinDisplay.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Enforce built-in display

allowDesktopMacs.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Allow desktop Macs

ignoreDisplayValidationErrors.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Ignore errors when validating displays

checkFullMacOSVersionNumber.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → macOS → Check full macOS version number

useAssessmentMode.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → iOS → Use Assessment Mode (AAC/ASAM) if available

useModernAACAPI.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → iOS → Use modern AAC API

allowSingleAppMode.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → iOS → Allow Single App Mode

guidedAccessCompatibility.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → iOS → Guided Access Compatibility

allowIOSScreenCapture.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → iOS → Allow iOS screen capture

preventAutoLock.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → iOS → Prevent auto-lock

lockScreenAfterSleepMode.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → iOS → Lock screen after sleep mode

ignoreSEBService.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → System Lockdown → SEB Service (Win) → Ignore SEB Service

allowWindowsUpdate.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → System Lockdown → SEB Service (Win) → Allow Windows Update to run while SEB is running

allowChromeNotifications.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → System Lockdown → SEB Service (Win) → Allow notifications from Chrome browsers

enableSwitchUser.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Enable Switch User

enableLockThisComputer.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Enable Lock this computer

enableChangeAPassword.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Enable Change a password

enableStartTaskManager.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Enable Start Task Manager

enableLogOff.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Enable Log off

enableShutDown.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Enable Shut down

enableEaseOfAccess.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Enable Ease of Access

enableNetworkConnectionSelector.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Enable network connection selector

setVMwareConfiguration.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Set VMware configuration

enableVMwareClientShade.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Registry → Options in the Windows Security Screen invoked by Ctrl-Alt-Del → While running SEB → Set VMware configuration → Enable VMware Client Shade

enableEsc.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Special Keys (Win) → Enable Esc

enableCtrlEsc.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Special Keys (Win) → Enable Ctrl-Esc

enableAltEsc.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Special Keys (Win) → Enable Alt-Esc

enableAltTab.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Special Keys (Win) → Enable Alt-Tab

enableAltF4.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Special Keys (Win) → Enable Alt-F4

enableRightMouse.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Special Keys (Win) → Enable Right Mouse

enablePrintScreen.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Special Keys (Win) → Enable Print Screen

enableAltMousewheel.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Special Keys (Win) → Enable Alt-Mousewheel

enableF1.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Function Keys (Win) → Enable F1

enableF2.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Function Keys (Win) → Enable F2

enableF3.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Function Keys (Win) → Enable F3

enableF4.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Function Keys (Win) → Enable F4

enableF5.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Function Keys (Win) → Enable F5

enableF6.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Function Keys (Win) → Enable F6

enableF7.macos: Security → OS Specific Settings → Hooked Keys → Function Keys (Win) → Enable F7
